reviewText:
Playboy - Biker Babes Hot Wheels & High Heels is fifty-seven minutes long and was released on DVD on October 1, 1997. Biker Babes is hosted by Tylyn John: Playboy Playmate of the Month for March 1992. The vast majority of the video are a bunch of models in the nude. There were only three Playmates in the video: Tylyn John, Nikki Schieler, and Karin Taylor. Her are the segments and my comments on them is the order that they appeared.

Nikki Schieler (Playboy Playmate of the Month for September 1997)\Pool Hall-Getting nude on a motorcycle
Bethany Lorranie & Katalina Verdin\Navy Seals-Getting nude on a boat
Denise\Clean Cycle-Denise gets nude and bathes on a motorcycle. This segment was not done in one take. Denise's panties start off pink, then they are blue and back to pink again. The same goes for the sponge she is bathing. The sponge goes through sever color changes. Also during filming, Denise looks dry when she is suppose to be wet in the segment.
Karin Taylor (Playboy Playmate of the Month for June 1996)\Space Age-Nude on a motorcycle
Daytona-Full nudity towards the end of the segment by one female
Corey Lane, Erin, & Kim\Tattoo Mistress-Five not so sexy females getting it on
Mimie & Shelby\Scooter Ride-Both ladies are full nude in and out of the pool.
Brittany, Carrie, Dawnette, Malaea, & Michelle\Factory Fun-A third into the segment and are five ladies are nude most of the time.
Linda O'Neil\The Presentation-Linda strips to full nudity on and off the motorcycle.
Laura Selway, Shyra De Land, & Vicki\Cross Dressers-Start out nude and then sexually put on their motor cross gear on. Two of the three ladies get wet and a play in a sand box. All three take turns being nude on a rock.
Tylyn John & Avalon Anders\Biker Bash-Tylyn is filming Avalon getting nude on a motorcycle and then Avalon is filming Tylyn getting nude on a motorcycle.

With the exception of two segments and the lack of Playmates, this is really good watch. The main difference between the VHS and DVD version is that the VHS version comes with a preview of Playboy's Girls in Uniform; the DVD does not come with any previews. Playboy - Biker Babes Hot Wheels & High Heels gets an AAA+++.

PLAY
CHAPTER INDEX
1. Program Start
2. Pool Hall
3. Navy Seals
4. Clean Cycle
5. Space Age Speed
6. Daytona
7. Tattoo Mistress
8. Scooter Ride
9. Factory Fun
10. The Presentation
11. Cross Dressers
12. Time to Party
13. Biker Bash
14. End Credits

There are three things you would expect from a title such as: Biker Babes - Hot wheels and High Heels.
First, Babes who like bikes.  Secondly -  Some fast bikes. (are bikes "hot?" I don't think so!)  And thirdly, the  aforementioned babes wearing high heels, while possibly cavorting around  and on  the bikes.
Well, that's what I thought anyway. And that isn't  exactly what you get.  Let me start by saying that the image quality is not  especially brilliant. A very grainy picture is apparent which ruins it  slightly.  The introductions are done by Tylyn John, Miss March 1992 - who  is extremely sexy.  Sadly she only strips at the very end - more of her  would have been a real treat. She does appear between the scenes though and  is a welcome addition rather than just having segments stuck together.  There is only really one other scene of interest though, which is a  presentation done by some woman who's name I can't even remember. She is  selling a bike and of course gets naked and writhes around in all her naked  glory.  It must also be pointed out that she is really the only woman  wearing high heels, most others are barefoot or wearing boots with very  little or no heel.  The rest is passable at best, and if it wasn't for  Tylyn John and the presentation scene it would have got one star.
